## Paper Details
- **Title:** {Full title}
- **Authors:** {Author list}
- **Year:** {YYYY}
- **Venue:** {Conference/Journal}
- **DOI/arXiv:** {link}

## Reading Guide Questions
1. What problem does this paper address?
2. What is the key contribution?
3. How does the method work?
4. What are the limitations?
5. How does this relate to the course?

## Discussion Points
- Point 1 for class discussion
- Point 2 for class discussion
- Point 3 for class discussion

## Follow-up Resources
- Related paper 1
- Blog post explaining concepts
- Code implementation (if available)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Paper verified to exist (DOI resolves)
- [ ] Reading guide questions are specific
- [ ] Estimated reading time noted
